markdownRemark.html: I’ve just obtained the spatialparalysis.xyz domain. I’m going to move my blog here from my old blog/portfolio website (nearimprov.com). I wanted to try out Gatsby JS, so that I could build some little React components and include them in various places. I’ve used React a lot over the last two years, and since I’ve accepted a new job with a lot less web development, I might have the desire to make some components for fun rather than for profit.
